extracted_playbook.title: Monitor for Ransomware Threats
extracted_playbook.description: Continuously and actively monitor for ransomware threats over holidays and weekends.

extracted_playbook.title: Subscribe to CISA Cybersecurity Publications
extracted_playbook.description: Subscribe to CISA cybersecurity publications for the latest alerts.

extracted_playbook.title: Identify On-Call IT Security Employees
extracted_playbook.description: Identify IT security employees to be available and 'on call' during holidays and weekends in the event of a ransomware attack.

extracted_playbook.title: Make Offline Backup of Data
extracted_playbook.description: Make and maintain offline, encrypted backups of data and regularly test your backups.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement User Training Program
extracted_playbook.description: Implement a user training program and phishing exercises to raise awareness about the risks of visiting malicious websites or opening malicious attachments.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is RDP or other potentially risky services in use?

extracted_playbook.title: Secure and Monitor RDP
extracted_playbook.description: Limit access to resources over internal networks, restrict RDP, use virtual desktop infrastructure, require MFA, and monitor RDP logs.

extracted_playbook.title: Disable Unused Ports and Protocols
extracted_playbook.description: Disable ports and protocols that are not being used for a business purpose, such as RDP Transmission Control Protocol Port 3389.

extracted_playbook.title: Disable or Block SMB Protocol
extracted_playbook.description: Disable or block Server Message Block (SMB) protocol outbound and remove or disable outdated versions of SMB.

extracted_playbook.title: Review Security Posture of Third-Party Vendors
extracted_playbook.description: Review the security posture of third-party vendors and ensure all connections are monitored and reviewed for suspicious activity.

extracted_playbook.title: Update OS and Software
extracted_playbook.description: Upgrade software and operating systems to currently supported versions and regularly patch and update software.

extracted_playbook.title: Conduct Regular Vulnerability Scanning
extracted_playbook.description: Conduct regular vulnerability scanning to identify and address vulnerabilities, especially on internet-facing devices.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Strong Passwords
extracted_playbook.description: Ensure strong passwords and challenge responses. Passwords should not be reused across multiple accounts.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Multi-Factor Authentication
extracted_playbook.description: Require multi-factor authentication (MFA) for all services, particularly for remote access, VPNs, and accounts accessing critical systems.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement Network Segmentation
extracted_playbook.description: Implement network segmentation with multiple layers, with critical communications in the most secure layer.

extracted_playbook.title: Filter Network Traffic
extracted_playbook.description: Filter network traffic to prohibit communications with known malicious IP addresses and implement URL blocklists/allowlists.

extracted_playbook.title: Scan Network for Open Ports
extracted_playbook.description: Scan network for open and listening ports and close those that are unnecessary.

extracted_playbook.title: Secure Home Networks for Remote Workers
extracted_playbook.description: Secure home networks for remote workers, use separate devices for separate activities, and do not exchange home and work content.

extracted_playbook.title: Secure User Accounts
extracted_playbook.description: Regularly audit administrative user accounts and configure access controls under the principles of least privilege and separation of duties.

extracted_playbook.title: Have an Incident Response Plan
extracted_playbook.description: Create, maintain, and exercise a basic cyber incident response plan with procedures for response and notification in a ransomware incident.

extracted_playbook.title: Use Ransomware Response Checklist
extracted_playbook.description: Follow the Ransomware Response Checklist in case of infection and scan backups with an antivirus program.

extracted_playbook.title: Regularly Audit Logs
extracted_playbook.description: Regularly audit logs to ensure new accounts are legitimate users.
